Visit the Tit-for-Tariff website http://people.ischool.berkeley.edu/~conner/Tit-for-Tariff/

Storytelling with data

Data visualization and history of trade tariffs in America. I personaly developed and styled the website, storyboarded the narrative, and created the “History of Tariffs” and “Escalating Tariffs and the Makings of a Trade War” interactions.

Client

Personal project

Duration

2 weeks
